snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Thursday's selections include speculation that Apple's mobile devices may be trying to distance themselves from Google's map service and an...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Thursday's selections include speculation that Apple's mobile devices may be trying to distance themselves from Google's map service and an extensive statistical analysis of personal e-mail, phone calls and keystrokes.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: A Very Examined Life, and Cable TV as an App
